title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Planning
body: Planning       Enabling Legislation  Public Law 101-485 Public Law 105-363 Public Law 111-11  General Management Plan  Section 1 - Pages 1-50 (PDF 4.12 MB) Section 2 - Pages 51-100 (PDF 3.18 MB) Section 3 - Pages 101-110 (PDF 0.69 MB)  Superintendent's Compendium  Superintendent's Compendium (PDF 278 KB)  Historic Structures Reports  Volume I - Weir House, Weir Studio, Young Studio (PDF 14 MB) Volume I - Appendices (PDF 3.9 MB) Volume IIA - Weir Complex Barn & Outbuildings (PDF 8.4 MB) Volume IIB - Caretaker's Cottage & Garage (PDF 8.7 MB) Volume III - Burlingham Complex (PDF 10.4 MB)  Cultural Landscape Report  Cultural Landscape Report, Vol 1: Site History (PDF 9.66MB) Cultural Landscape Report, Vol 2: Updated Treatment Plan & Record of Treatment (PDF 27 MB)  Long Range Interpretive Plan  Long Range Interpretive Plan (PDF 3.9 MB)  Historic Resource Study  Historic Resource Study (PDF 8.2 MB)  Weir House Historic Furnishings Report   Weir House Historic Furnishings Report, Addendum, and Implementation Plan (PDF 17.2 MB)
